50224.affected_area: Lower Mainland (Port Coquitlam, Maple Ridge, Mission and Abbotsford)
live_updates: Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours. Thank you for your patience! We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50224.summary: Some customers in the Fraser Valley (Port Coquitlam, Maple Ridge, Mission and Abbotsford) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50224.title: Jun 2 - Lower Mainland (Various) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue. Thank you for your patience.
